meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a skilled worker
meanings.sent1: Her workmanlike approach to the project impressed her colleagues.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter's workmanlike skills were evident in the finely crafted furniture.
meanings.sent3: The chef's workmanlike precision with the knife made chopping vegetables look like a dance.
meanings.sent4: His workmanlike attention to detail transformed the ordinary task into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The artist's workmanlike brushstrokes brought life to the canvas.

meanings.definition: Showing skill and efficiency in one's work
meanings.sent1: The mechanic's workmanlike repair of the car got it running smoothly again.
meanings.sent2: Her workmanlike handling of the situation prevented any further issues.
meanings.sent3: The student's workmanlike speed in solving the math problem left the teacher amazed.
meanings.sent4: His workmanlike ability to adapt to new challenges made him a valuable team member.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's workmanlike dedication to training paid off in the competition.

meanings.definition: Done in a competent and professional manner
meanings.sent1: The lawyer's workmanlike presentation of the case convinced the jury.
meanings.sent2: The tailor's workmanlike stitching ensured the dress fit perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's workmanlike delivery of jokes had the audience roaring with laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her workmanlike organization of the event made it a huge success.
meanings.sent5: The pilot's workmanlike landing in challenging weather conditions impressed the passengers.
